titles.title: Fair Physician Licensure Reciprocity Standards Act of 1987

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to prohibit States, as a condition of medicaid funding, from discriminating among licensed physicians in its medical reciprocity standards on the basis of the location of the medical school from which they graduated.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/15/1987--Introduced. Fair Physician Licensure Reciprocity Standards Act of 1987 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to prohibit State physician licensure reciprocity standards from distinguishing among physicians on the basis of the location of the medical school from which such physicians graduated.
